create_access_code.name: Create access code
create_access_code.description: Create a new access code on a Kwikset smart lock.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Kwikset lock device to create the access code on.

code.name: Code
code.description: A 4 to 8 digit numeric access code.

name.name: Name
name.description: A friendly name for the access code (e.g., 'Dog Walker').

slot.name: Slot
slot.description: Slot index on the lock (0 = auto-assign next available). Range: 0-255.

schedule_type.name: Schedule type
schedule_type.description: When the code is active: all_day (always), date_range, weekly, one_time_unlimited, one_time_24_hour.

start_time.name: Start time
start_time.description: Start time for date_range or weekly schedules (HH:MM format).

end_time.name: End time
end_time.description: End time for date_range or weekly schedules (HH:MM format).

start_date.name: Start date
start_date.description: Start date for date_range schedule (YYYY-MM-DD format).

end_date.name: End date
end_date.description: End date for date_range schedule (YYYY-MM-DD format).

days_of_week.name: Days of week
days_of_week.description: Active days for weekly schedule (e.g., monday, wednesday, friday).

edit_access_code.name: Edit access code
edit_access_code.description: Edit an existing access code on a Kwikset smart lock.

code.name: Code
code.description: The updated numeric access code (4-8 digits).

name.name: Name
name.description: The updated friendly name for the access code.

slot.name: Slot
slot.description: The slot index the code occupies on the lock (0-255).

schedule_type.name: Schedule type
schedule_type.description: The updated schedule type for the access code.

disable_access_code.name: Disable access code
disable_access_code.description: Disable an existing access code on a Kwikset smart lock by slot number. If the code was created through Home Assistant, stored details are used automatically. For codes created outside HA, provide code, name, and schedule_type.

slot.name: Slot
slot.description: The slot index the code occupies on the lock (0-255).

code.name: Code
code.description: Optional. The numeric access code. Required only if the code was not created through Home Assistant.

name.name: Name
name.description: Optional. Override the stored friendly name.

schedule_type.name: Schedule type
schedule_type.description: Optional. Override the stored schedule type.

enable_access_code.name: Enable access code
enable_access_code.description: Re-enable a previously disabled access code on a Kwikset smart lock by slot number. If the code was created through Home Assistant, stored details are used automatically. For codes created outside HA, provide code, name, and schedule_type.

code.name: Code
code.description: Optional. The numeric access code. Required only if the code was not created through Home Assistant.

name.name: Name
name.description: Optional. Override the stored friendly name.

schedule_type.name: Schedule type
schedule_type.description: Optional. Override the stored schedule type.

delete_access_code.name: Delete access code
delete_access_code.description: Delete a specific access code from a Kwikset smart lock by its slot number.

slot.name: Slot
slot.description: Slot index of the access code to delete (0-255).

delete_all_access_codes.name: Delete all access codes
delete_all_access_codes.description: Delete all access codes from a Kwikset smart lock. This action cannot be undone.

list_access_codes.name: List access codes
list_access_codes.description: List all known access codes on a Kwikset smart lock, including codes managed through Home Assistant and codes detected from the lock.

device_offline.title: 裝置離線: {device_name}
device_offline.description:
鎖 **{device_name}** 似乎處於離線狀態。這可能是由於：

- 電池電量低
- WiFi 連線問題
- 裝置超出範圍

請檢查裝置，確保其有電源和 WiFi 連線。

auth_failed.title: 需要驗證
auth_failed.description: Kwikset 整合需要重新驗證。請前往 **設定 → 裝置與服務 → Kwikset** 並點擊 **重新設定** 來更新您的憑證。

confirm.title: 重新驗證 Kwikset
confirm.description:
Kwikset 整合（**{entry_title}**）的驗證權杖已過期，需要重新整理。

這通常發生在：
- 權杖在長時間後自然過期
- 在 Kwikset 應用程式中更改了密碼
- 從另一台裝置登出了帳戶

點擊下方的 **修復** 按鈕重新輸入您的 Kwikset 憑證。
